title: InStem Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Associate Posts
description: Institute for Stem Cell Biology and Regenerative Medicine (InStem) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we listed more about the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the InStem Recruitment 2025 .
